SenseMaker 1.0 by ZER0

SenseMaker is a tool to supercharge collective SenseMaking using ZER0 Networks.

- Share content directly to ZER0 Networks from the comfort of your own browser.
- Engage in real-time discussions with other Network Members around a particular website or topic. 
- Highlight websites and engage in contextual conversations.
